BUILD_DATA_RETRIEVAL_FAILED.description: Failed to retrieve build data from the database

BUILD_NOT_FOUND.description: Framework build data cannot be found

data.cmd: The command that caused the error
data.message: A detailed error message passed from adapt-cli

CLI_BUILD_FAILED.description: Framework build using the adapt-cli failed

COURSE_NOT_FOUND.description: Requested course could not be found

data._id: Database document _id value for the missing course build

FW_BUILD_NOT_FOUND.description: Framework build could not be found in the database

data.import: Framework version used in import course
data.installed: Framework version currently installed on the server

FW_INCOMPAT.description: Course for import uses a framework version incompatible with that installed

IMPORT_INVALID.description: An invalid import zip has been provided

INVALID_COURSE.description: An invalid course has been provided

MISSING_PLUGINS.description: Course for import uses plugins which are missing from the server
